alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 2:59PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central St. Bernard, south central Orleans, central Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 345 PM CDT... At 258 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Meraux to near Poydras to near Jean Lafitte. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 30 to 40 mph and very heavy, locally flooding rainfall potential. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Chalmette, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Harvey, Gretna, Jean Lafitte, Woodmere, Violet, Terrytown, Meraux, Poydras, Myrtle Grove, Estelle, Arabi and Lafitte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
